translation.en: [man on radio] Jurassic One, Jurassic One, come in.
This is Isla Nublar Base, over.
-[woman on radio] Go, Jurassic One. -[man] Emergency. Hostiles in pursuit.
translation.ko: - 여기는 쥬라기 원 - 비상사태다 추격전이 벌어지고 있다

translation.en: Two friendlies in need of immediate extraction.
translation.ko: 아군 두 명을 즉시 구출해야 한다

translation.en: -[woman] Roger that, Base! On our way. -[velociraptors screeching]
We can't stop here. Follow me!
[man] Hurry! We're almost to the extraction point!
[boy] No! We can use the river to mask our scent and--
translation.ko: 안 돼요! 강물로 우리 체취를 덮고...

translation.en: Yeah, like you know what cool is.
-[keyboard clacking] -[grunts] Get off me, Brand! -[Brand chuckles] -[grunts]
The dinos get you and that old dude every time.
translation.ko: 너랑 그 아저씨는 맨날 공룡한테 당하잖아

translation.en: If I can just get around the T. rex, I'd beat the game and win the--
I-I know. You've said it, like, a thousand times.
translation.ko: 나도 알거든 입만 열면 그 소리잖아

translation.en: But if straight-up gamers say this thing's unwinnable,
how's some dino-nerd kid gonna beat it?
Great pep talk, bro. You been working on that?
translation.ko: 격려 고마워, 형 미리 준비한 대사야?

translation.en: [sighs] Look, Darius, I know getting to Jurassic World
translation.ko: 다리우스 쥬라기 월드 여행이 아빠와의 꿈이었던 건 알지만

translation.en: was your and Dad's dream, but there's more to life than just dinosaurs.
translation.ko: 쥬라기 월드 여행이 아빠와의 꿈이었던 건 알지만 공룡이 세상의 전부는 아니거든

translation.en: You never leave your room anymore, bruh.
I hear you, but even if winning is dumb and hopeless,
translation.ko: 형 말은 이해하는데 한심하고 가망 없는 꿈이라도

translation.en: I still gotta try, you know?
Can you at least, like, take a break? Maybe work in a shower?
[sighs] All right, look, you do you, D. Just do it quietly.
translation.ko: 그럼 너 알아서 하고 조용히만 해

translation.en: I don't want Mom on my case again for you staying up...
translation.ko: 너 안 잔다고 엄마가 나한테 잔소리...

translation.en: Where are you? Where are you? Where are you?
I'm Mr. DNA, and you're the first person to ever beat our game,
translation.ko: 전 미스터 DNA예요 사상 최초로 우리 게임을 깨셨으니

translation.en: so we wanna reward you with a trip
translation.ko: 그에 대한 보상으로 쥬라기 월드가 새롭게 준비한

translation.en: to Jurassic World's brand-new, state-of-the-art adventure camp.
translation.ko: 쥬라기 월드가 새롭게 준비한 최첨단 어드벤처 캠프로 초대할게요!

translation.en: That's right, get ready to join us at Camp Cretaceous!
translation.ko: 그래요, 준비 단단히 하시고 백악기 캠프에서 만나요!
이슬라 누블라에 온 걸 환영한다, 얘들아

translation.en: You are the chosen few, the first kids in the entire world
translation.ko: 너희는 선택받은 소수야 전 세계를 통틀어 최초로

translation.en: I know, the trip from the mainland was rough on some.
translation.ko: 그래, 배 타고 오느라 힘든 사람도 있겠지

translation.en: You heard that correctly-- head honcho, big shot.
I'm Roxie, head counselor of Camp Cretaceous.
translation.ko: 환영한다, 얘들아 난 록시야 백악기 캠프의 수석 카운슬러지

translation.en: [chuckles] Well, it's sort of a co-head counselor sort of situation.
Anyway, some of you won contests to be here,
some of you had VIP invites, but for the next two weeks,
translation.ko: VIP 초청으로 온 사람도 있는데 앞으로 2주간

translation.en: all of you will be getting the five-star treatment!
As our first campers, we've lined up
exclusive behind-the-scenes tours of Jurassic World.
translation.ko: 쥬라기 월드를 속속들이 엿볼 특별한 투어도 준비했어

translation.en: As well as kayaking, rock climbing, obstacle courses, and of course...
translation.ko: 카약, 암벽 등반 장애물 코스는 물론...
그래, 다리우스 공룡도 잔뜩 볼 거야

translation.en: But I'm gonna need that speech a little shorter,
and really try to lean into the majesty of this place.
Let's get the six of you to camp.
Uh, there are five of us.
Dino-kid, Track-Star, Internet Girl, Barfy, Texas.
translation.ko: 공룡 덕후, 육상 선수 인터넷 스타, 멀미, 텍사스

translation.en: Greetings, my dudes. Kenji is here, so let the party commence!
translation.ko: 안녕, 친구들! 켄지 님이 행차하셨으니 파티를 시작해 볼까요?

translation.en: [Ben] I hope you got my mom's note.
I don't do well on windy roads.
It's your girl Brooklynn coming at you from the best place ever:
Like and subscribe to join me as I unbox Jurassic World!
translation.ko: '좋아요' 누르고 구독해 주시면 제가 쥬라기 월드를 언박싱해 드릴게요!

translation.en: Okay, I need you all to say who you are and a little bit about yourself.
translation.ko: 자, 다들 자기소개나 간단하게 해 봐

translation.en: I beat this awesome VR dinosaur game.
translation.ko: 전 끝내주는 VR 공룡 게임을 깼어요

translation.en: I just can't believe... you're Brooklynn!
translation.ko: 내가 지금 꿈꾸는 건가? 네가 브루클린이라고?

translation.en: Oh, also, my family supplies all the beef for the park, and that's how I got here.
translation.ko: 난 이 공원에 소고기를 납품하는 목장 딸이라 초대됐어

translation.en: Oh, that's just what my online followers call themselves.
Uh, all 27 million of us. [imitates gunfire]
Yep. That's why she's the only one who gets to keep her cell phone.
translation.ko: 맞아, 그래서 쟤만 휴대 전화를 안 뺏겼지

translation.en: -[car door opens] -Um, Dave, what's going on?
-Nothing you need to worry about. -[electricity crackles]
But you should all definitely stay in your seats.
Oh, these things are always getting out of their enclosure.
translation.ko: 이 녀석들은 틈만 나면 우리에서 탈출하지

translation.en: It took a blanket and a cat carrier to catch it.
Hey, Brooklanders, check this place out!
Is this not the most amazing place you have ever seen?
If you think this is cool, you should see my dad's penthouse in the main park.
translation.ko: 여길 보고 감탄하다니 우리 아빠 펜트하우스 보면 기절하겠네

translation.en: So, as an elite athlete, how pumped are you for camp?
translation.ko: 안녕, 대답해 봐 엘리트 운동선수로서 이번 캠프가 기대되지 않니?

translation.en: Not a huge fan of being on camera.
This place is almost as big as my family's ranch back home.
translation.ko: 여긴 우리 가족이 운영하는 목장만큼 넓네요!

translation.en: That's because when we're up and running,
the camp will house 500 kids and 150 staff.
translation.ko: 참가자 500명과 직원 150명을 수용할 수 있는 규모거든

translation.en: Announcement time from your co-head counselors.
Okay, everyone, there's some ground rules to cover.
translation.ko: 좋아, 얘들아 기본 규칙을 알려 줄게

translation.en: Curfew's at 8:00 p.m., and lights out at 9:00 p.m. sharp.
We are in a dinosaur-filled jungle.
You must always keep your distance,
or you could be seriously hurt, if not worse.
translation.ko: 크게 다치거나 큰일 날 수 있다고

translation.en: -First one there gets top bunk! -[Kenji grunts]
translation.ko: 먼저 가는 사람이 침대 위층 찜!

translation.en: -[shrieks] -[Roxie] Get this lovely lady back to her pen.
Oh, man, I really wanted to get a closer look at that Compy.
translation.ko: 아깝다, 저 콤프를 자세히 보고 싶었는데!

translation.en: I like your enthusiasm, Darius, but right now it's "claiming a bunk" time.
translation.ko: 네 열정은 맘에 든다 다리우스 근데 지금은 침대를 정할 시간이야

translation.en: So, you know... go claim a bunk.
But it's the first dinosaur I've ever seen in person
translation.ko: 근데 저 녀석은 난생처음 본 공룡인걸요

translation.en: and, I mean, we're here to see dinosaurs, so...
translation.ko: 근데 저 녀석은 난생처음 본 공룡인걸요 우린 공룡을 구경하러 온 거니까...

translation.en: Oh, the day is not over, buddy.
Wow, you really do know your stuff, dino-nerd.
They don't have those here. Common mistake.
They are cooking up all kinds of new dinos in that lab.
translation.ko: 연구소에서 온갖 새 공룡을 개발 중이거든

translation.en: Whoa! Where are they herding 'em to?
They're herding them back to their nighttime enclosures.
Me? Maybe Yasmina should go first, or... Darius?
translation.ko: 저부터 타요? 야스미나부터 보내죠 다리우스는 어때요?

translation.en: Uh... Or anyone! I really don't-- [screams]
Oh, hey there, dino-nerd. Whatcha doing?
I was just, uh, heading out 'cause...
Oh, yeah. I... I meant, um... hungry.
Oh, heh, look at that. Thanks, Kenji.
I don't want you to be intimidated by me just because I'm rich,
translation.ko: 나한테 쫄지 마라 내가 부자인 데다

translation.en: my father owns a few condos on the island, and I'm rich.
translation.ko: 이 섬에 우리 아빠 콘도가 몇 채나 있고 - 내가 부자라고 해서 말이야 - 난 안 쫄았거든

translation.en: -Uh, I'm not intimidated by you. -Oh, good.
translation.ko: - 내가 부자라고 해서 말이야 - 난 안 쫄았거든 다행이네

translation.en: I just want us to be friends, and friends tell each other stuff.
translation.ko: 너랑 친해지고 싶은데 친구끼린 다 털어놔야지

translation.en: For instance, what they're doing out of bed after curfew.
translation.ko: 예를 들어 통금 후에 안 자고 뭐 하는지 말이야

translation.en: I think you best get your arm off me... friend.
translation.ko: 내 어깨에 두른 팔이나 치우시지, 친구

translation.en: Oh. Why don't you make me, friend?
So that's what toxic masculinity looks like.
Uh, sorry we woke you. I--
He was sneaking out, but I set him straight.
translation.ko: 얘가 몰래 나가려고 해서 내가 잘 타일렀어

translation.en: Look, I try to look out for the younger kids.
I've been waiting my whole life to get here,
translation.ko: 난 여기 올 날만을 평생 기다렸는데

translation.en: and I'm gonna make the most of it.
translation.ko: 난 여기 올 날만을 평생 기다렸는데 이 기회를 한껏 활용할래

translation.en: Those lights must be coming from the Compy enclosure.
translation.ko: 저 빛은 콤프 우리에서 나오는 게 분명한데

translation.en: Sneaking out to see dinosaurs in the dead of night,
The truck definitely headed this direction.
Of course this is it. Why else would they have--
You can get a good shot from over here.
-Wait! What are you-- -I got it, kid.
translation.ko: - 잠깐, 무슨 짓... - 나만 믿어, 꼬마야

translation.en: Great. Now, just climb back up and gently hand it to me.
translation.ko: 다행이네, 그럼 올라와서 나한테 살며시 돌려줘

translation.en: Sure, sure, right after I get a sweet dino-pic for your followers.
translation.ko: 그래, 알았어 네 팔로워한테 보여 줄 공룡 사진부터 찍을게

translation.en: Quiet, junior! The grown-ups are talking.
Ah, your followers are gonna love this.
D'ah! Open the gate! Open the gate!
Dude! Please tell me you have a plan.
Let's move! The steam should keep him busy.
translation.ko: 가자, 저 녀석은 증기에 한눈팔 거야
